reviews.review: This once great game is under heavy siege by third part software. Making a game Free to play with horrible anti cheat is a joke..... the only thing that kept most people from installing walls to aim to whatever was the 20$ barrier. This unfortunately means nothing now. People can make accounts for free to test if vac will detect the software. This gives them the biggest advantage over Valve. Do not install this game, It is no longer fun. I have somewhere between 12 to 14k hours total in CS from the the original release. Cheating has always been an issue but never every time you played. Now it has devolved into the biggest pos most toxic game where cheaters run wild and talk shit to you the whole time. They are not smurfs they are in fact cheaters.
El mejor juego si tenes pensado aprender portugués
jogo muito divertido para passar o tempo

Топовая игра всех времён.

Я считаю, это игра заслуживает премии!

After 1120 hours of CS:GO, I can only say that every f...ing minute of my gameplay was filled with pure rage caused by an endless flood of cheating. This game is an unattended, neglected trash, used solely to sell skins. By all means enjoy your pow pow, I am signing off permanently!
